description:
The more Koharu learns about her mysterious club, the more unsettled she is. For one thing, her fellow members seem to think she may be the "main character". For another, Yua has the ability to read Koharu`s thoughts... or at least hear her voice-over narration. And then there are the strange club activities, like a mash-up of soccer with composing haiku...
Source: crunchyroll
